title: Write documentation for autoscaling APIs, triggers, actions, listeners for Solr 7.1
description: This issue is to document all the new features and changes in autoscaling for Solr 7.1

comments.content: I've created a branch named jira/solr-11165 based off of autoscaling branch for this issue and pushed some changes. I kinda forgot that 7.0 has limited autoscaling features and wrote an overview page having 7.1 features. So I have put my current work on this branch and I am going to disentangle the 7.0 specific stuff and put it on master as part of SOLR-10821.
comments.author: Shalin Shekhar Mangar
